pages.text: Put an accepted Block in the sieve. -> Right click to sieve the block down.$(br2)All Blocks have different item drops.

pages.title: Accepted Blocks
pages.text: $(li)Grass / Lush Grass$(li)Dirt / Lush Dirt$(li)Coarse Dirt$(li)Rooted Dirt$(li)Rocky Dirt$(li)Gravel$(li)Clay$(li)Sand / Red Sand$(li)Podzol / Mycelium$(li)Moss
